document.full_text: texas state government warnings to americans about travel to mexico are "ludicrous," "misinformed," and may damage the country's safest tourist destinations, mexico's tourism chief told reuters on wednesday.
document.title: mexican official challenges texas travel warnings
lines_and_colors: texas state government warnings to americans about travel to mexico are "ludicrous," "misinformed," and may damage the country's safest tourist destinations, mexico's tourism chief told reuters on wednesday.
